entry.p: I'm currently reading the following books:

ul.li: Where Mathematics Comes From: How the Embodied Mind Brings Mathematics into Being by George Lakoff and Rafael Nuñez
The Roads to Modernity: The British, French, and American Enlightenments by Gertrude Himmelfarb
Why I Am Not a Muslim by Ibn Warraq
Jihad in the West: Muslim Conquests from the 7th to the 21st Centuries by Paul Fregosi

entry.p: The last two are pretty depressing, but I'll probably post about that 25 days from now.
